skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
RM Smart Voice
The user account binding operation of RM Smart Voice could be completed quickly according to the following steps:
1.Download RM Smart Voice APP through Apple store or Google play or scan the QR code, then register and login;
2.Open RM Smart Voice App, click the top right “+" to add the devices (smart bad, etc.) . Accordingto the installation quide,finish the confiquration of the devices;
3.Open the Amazon Alexa APP and click the tab to"More".and
enter" Skills & Games”. Click the top right “Search”. Enter “RM Smart Voice"for searching the skills. Click“ENABLE TO USE” to login account and password of “RM Smart Voice", done the binding.
4.Click“DISCOVER DEVICES” to search devices that you are going to add and control by Alexa
5.Control your Smart bed with your voice. Use your voice commands to control your Smart bed ( e.g.,head up&down, foot up&down, TV,Lounge,Zero-G, Under-bed light on&off, Increase or decrease massage intensity and so on).You can know how to use the voice control skills by asking Example Phrases, so that you can understand the use of the product more quickly.This voice skill can perfectly realize all the control actions of the intelligent bed.
Suppored devices:
Scene, Smart bed.
